thread.title: hey philipp!

comments.text: i'm a new player and i can't wait to play your game. the problem is that i can't see any object in the world. no starting rock, no players in areas. i've doneted 9 euro, more
to come. my question: is there any problem with new account being created atm? server issues? or is there any other way to reset me and my kids account so we can start creating
awesome creations! a other thing is that i can't save a creation, when i do it says: ooops! something went wrong with this specific item. if you see this contact us!:)
hi micke, sorry i hadn't seen this, is the issue solved in the meantime? we chatted via email so i guess it might be!

thread.latestCommentText: hi micke, sorry i hadn't seen this, is the issue solved in the meantime? we chatted via email so i guess it might be!
